subject: Super Bowl
Coaches and Managers
Football
lead_paragraph: Bill O’Brien is the offensive coordinator who is leaving for Penn State. Josh McDaniels is the offensive coordinator who is returning. They will work together to prepare New England for the Super Bowl.
snippet: Bill O’Brien is the offensive coordinator who is leaving for Penn State. Josh McDaniels is the offensive coordinator who is returning. They will work together to prepare New England for the Super Bowl.
